respStmt.resp: Transcribed from images of original letters
respStmt.name: Sarah Tew
Giuliano Sidro
Millie You
Maddie Qualls

publicationStmt.distributor: The Center for the Tebtunis Papyri, The University of California, Berkeley
publicationStmt.authority: The Board of Trinity College Dublin, The University of Dublin

availability.p: Available for academic research purposes only.

objectDesc.p: Handwritten letter on one sheet with writing on front only.
Printed letterhead in black ink at top right reads:

recordHist.p: Images taken from Trinity College, Dublin: Page 1

projectDesc.p: This document was created as part of the History of Papyrology project [https://histpap.info/] by Sarah Tew, Giuliano Sidro, Maddie Qualls, and Millie You. The project is in affiliation the Center for Tebtunis Papyri at the University of California, Berkeley.

editorialDecl.p: Text has been transcribed diplomatically without corrections, normalization, or standardization.

punctuation.p: All punction marks have been retained nd represented using the appropriate Unicode code character except for apostrophes and ampersands which have been escaped using ' and &, respectively.

segmentation.p: The text has been segmented into lines according to line breaks in the original text automatically by Transkribus and line groupings based on groups identified automatically or manually declared by Sarah Tew in Transkribus. Page breaks have been manually edited by Sarah Tew, Giuliano Sidro, Maddie Qualls, and Millie You after export from Transkribus.

handNotes.handNote: Written in black ink by A.S. Hunt.

revisionDesc.change: Manually added TEI header to Transkribus tei.xml exported file.

body.ab:
Queen's College,
Oxford.
I thi received from you the
bulk of the collection, didn't he ?
Have you still at Dublin any
part of it, or of other carton-
nage from our diggings ? (I don't
want them : merely for information )
I hope that you flourish.
The summer term here has
been much upset by the strike,
of course, but the men are
all back at work again now.
Yoursever
A.S. Hunt
